title: Match the given motion graph to the scenario

content.prompt: The graphs above represent the position x, velocity v, and acceleration a as a function of time t for a marble moving in one dimension. Which of the following could describe the motion of the marble?

choices.label: Rolling along the floor and then bouncing off a wall
Rolling down one side of a bowl and then rolling up the other side
Rolling up a ramp and then rolling back down
Falling and then bouncing elastically off a hard floor

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
